game.name: Snow Ball Warrior
game.description:
You have already worn a crown of a true warrior in Antarctica. As a response, you have given a big task today. Are you in a mood to accept this big challenge right now? If you are nodding for yes, try out Snow Ball Warrior and get ready to perform the biggest task you have performed ever over the snow. Igloo is going to be destroyed by the snowballs. You are the only one who can defend the snowballs before they destroy the Igloo. 
It is not easy to accomplish this respectable purpose. All you need to do is just put your ultimate shooting skills to test to prevent large rolling snowballs from finishing all the igloos. You can take a chance now as you have just spent them a month constructing piece by piece. Use a simple snowball to knock down all your enemies in this one of the best shooting games for boys! Try to be very quick to throw small stones using a slingshot! Destroy the snowballs and buy different weapons and rocks!
Move through arrow keys and release fire using space key in this ice ball shooter game! Rotate using the left and right arrow keys! Your enemies will keep coming to you regularly. Try to keep your eyes on the screen all the time to win this snow battle in your own style! Throw a snowball and try to hit your targets every time to complete each level fast in this time-based game! We know that you have the skill to become one of the best snowball fighters of your area. Good luck to have a blast in our all fun games to play!

game.mobileControlKeys: SCROLL THE WARRIOR ON RIGHT SCREEN SWIPE,LEFT SCREEN TAP TO HIT
game.webControlKeys: ADJUST THE TARGET WITH MOUSE AND LEFT CLICK TO HIT
